item.title: Firepower Process Management
item.author: Author
item.description: Have you ever been in a situation where you wanted to troubleshoot a certain firepower process? Tried to kill a process, to re-start it with some debug flags but it was already re-started automatically by process manager? Well pmtool is here to help. Using pmtool you can disable services, restart processes and check dependencies between components on firepower systems.
